I should have been the one there.
but I guess that's the way the cookie crumbles.
translation.es: Pero supongo que así es la vida.

translation.en: -Armadas are here! -Yeah!
Yeah!!!
[woman] CP Ngozi Mmaduoko in her speech,
translation.es: Ngozi Mmaduoko, del Partido Comunista, convenció al público

translation.en: convinced the republic that the capture of the Armadas
translation.es: Ngozi Mmaduoko, del Partido Comunista, convenció al público de que la captura de los Armada restaurará la paz y el orden en el estado.

translation.en: will restore peace and order in the state.
translation.es: de que la captura de los Armada restaurará la paz y el orden en el estado.

translation.en: They are presently in the custody of the police, awaiting trial.
translation.es: Están bajo custodia de la policía a la espera del juicio.

translation.en: [Ahanna] I kept waiting for my sins to catch up with me.
translation.es: AÑOS DESPUÉS Seguí esperando el momento de pagar mis pecados.

translation.en: But nothing happened.
You can hold your breath underwater for only so long.
translation.es: Puedes aguantar la respiración bajo el agua

translation.en: Until you either drown or come up for air.
translation.es: hasta que te ahogues o subas por aire.

translation.en: [in Igbo] What are you doing? Do you like it?
It's lovely.
-Yeah? -You should frame this one.
Thank you baby.
Can I paint your face now?
-No. Come on. -Why?
You'll like it. Chill.
-[giggles] -I'll paint yours.
[TV] The art department of the Ebonyi state university will be revamped.
translation.es: El departamento de arte de la Universidad de Ebonyi se renovará gracias a una iniciativa

translation.en: Thanks to an initiative by former art curator, Adaugo Okolo.
translation.es: se renovará gracias a una iniciativa de la excuradora de arte Adaugo Okolo.

translation.en: After the international art scandal that rocked the world,
translation.es: Luego del escándalo de arte que sacudió al mundo,

translation.en: this alumni of the Ebonyi state university,
translation.es: esta alumna de la Universidad de Ebonyi

translation.en: will be putting her expertise into wonderful use.
translation.es: dará un uso maravilloso a su experiencia.

translation.en: [woman] Here she is sir.
And who might you be?
I'm the girl... who's going to bring you Snake's head on a platter.
translation.es: Soy la chica que le traerá la cabeza de Serpiente en bandeja.

translation.en: And what do you want in return for Snake?
translation.es: ¿Y qué quiere a cambio de Serpiente?

translation.en: [Mahmoud] I didn’t know they have a light version of this.
translation.es: No sabía que también hacían cerveza dietética.

translation.en: [Mahmoud] I should keep that in mind You know… for my blood sugar.
translation.es: Debería tenerlo en cuenta. Ya sabe, por mi azúcar en sangre.

translation.en: -Please just take-- -Shh.
[Ahhanna] Stay,
away from my wife.
I don’t believe we've met. I am Ali Mahmoud.
translation.es: Creo que no nos conocemos. Soy Ali Mahmoud.

translation.en: Oh… I see you're a chessman. We should play sometime.
translation.es: Veo que juega al ajedrez. Deberíamos jugar algún día.

translation.en: I've come to make you an offer,
I want nothing from you.
Ah, but you... haven't even heard my proposal.
translation.es: Pero ni siquiera escuchó mi propuesta.

translation.en: I'm giving you a chance, of redemption.
translation.es: Le estoy dando una oportunidad de redención.

translation.en: What does that even mean?
[Mahmoud] Your three friends. The almighty Armadas, remember them?
translation.es: Sus tres amigos. Los todopoderosos Armada. ¿Los recuerdas?

translation.en: [Mahmoud] The ones you left to rot and die in jail.
translation.es: Los que dejó para que se pudran y mueran en prisión.

translation.en: This is a chance to set them free.
How?
I've got connections. I could make a few phone calls,
translation.es: Tengo contactos. Podría hacer algunas llamadas.

translation.en: and they'd be out of jail.
What will you have me do?
The last heist.
I set the mark, you pay me what you are owing me, with interest of course.
translation.es: Yo marco el lugar. Me paga lo que me debe. Con interés, por supuesto.

translation.en: And then you and your friends can walk.
translation.es: Y luego usted y sus amigos pueden irse.

translation.en: I can't trust you.
You can't.
You see, I may have made this proposal like a request. But on the alternative…
translation.es: Quizá hice la propuesta como una petición. Pero la alternativa…

translation.en: You see this young man here...
will take your wife upstairs,
-have his way with her, and then, -[whimpering]
translation.es: hará lo que quiera con ella y luego…

translation.en: -put a bullet in your son's head. -No no no.
translation.es: le disparará en la cabeza a su hijo. ¡No!

translation.en: -No no. -[Mahmoud] Shh.
Checkmate.
I'll do it.
It's… Nedu and Chimamanda.
[in Igbo] I told you to abort the snake in your womb.
translation.es: Te dije que abortaras a esa serpiente.

translation.en: [in Igbo] I didn't know you were having twins.
They are innocent.
Snake's blood runs in their veins.
translation.es: La sangre de Serpiente corre por sus venas.

translation.en: They're his.
Why didn't you let me see you?
I've been dead for five years.
[in Igbo] I didn't think I'll make it out alive.
But you brought me out.
[in Igbo] Thank you, sister.
-[sobs] -[in Igbo] Thank you, sister.
Snake of all snakes. Welcome to your new office.
translation.es: La peor de todas las serpientes. Bienvenido a tu nueva oficina.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Sorry.
[in Pidgin] No time for nonsense. Do you understand?
My family? Where are they?
In similar condition.
Everything you need to know about the bank job is in that folder.
translation.es: Todo lo que necesitas saber del banco está en esa carpeta.

translation.en: When you've figured out a plan, you tell my boys and we move.
translation.es: Cuando tengas un plan, díselo a mis muchachos y actuaremos.

translation.en: First of all, I don’t do bank heists. It's too risky.
translation.es: Primero, no robo bancos. Muy arriesgado.

translation.en: Second of all, there is no way I can pull this off all by myself.
translation.es: Segundo, no hay forma de que lo haga solo.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Who said anything about you? All we need is that snake brain of yours.
translation.es: ¿Quién dijo algo de hacerlo tú? Solo necesitamos tu cerebro de serpiente.

translation.en: If anything happens to my wife and son, I swear to God--
translation.es: Si algo le pasa a mi esposa e hijo, juro por Dios…

translation.en: -There is no God. -[tense chord]
If you fuck up, their blood is on your head.
translation.es: Si lo arruinas, su sangre quedará en tu cabeza.

translation.en: [Ahanna] There was no time to feel sorry for myself.
I knew I couldn’t trust Mahmoud. But my family was on the line.
translation.es: No podía confiar en Mahmoud. Pero mi familia estaba en riesgo.

translation.en: My brothers included.
I need chalk.
I knew City bank well. despite being a small bank,
translation.es: Conocía bien el City Bank. A pesar de ser pequeño,

translation.en: on the third Friday of each month, City bank hands out civil servants payslip.
translation.es: el tercer viernes de cada mes, reparte los sueldos de los funcionarios

translation.en: You would never think it. But on these days,
translation.es: Uno nunca lo imaginaría, pero en esos días,

translation.en: this small sleepy Surulere bank, has over 200 million naira pass through it.
translation.es: este pequeño y tranquilo banco de Surulere maneja más de 200 millones de nairas.

translation.en: The more I looked at the information, the more scared I got.
translation.es: Cuanto más revisaba la información, más miedo me daba.

translation.en: Tell Mahmoud I'm ready.
I've always wondered what a PhD in stealing looks like.
translation.es: Siempre me he preguntado cómo se ve un doctor en robos.

translation.en: I erm, I have a question.
The person who got you this intel, he works with the bank?
translation.es: ¿El que le dio esta información… trabaja en el banco?

translation.en: Something like that.
Can he... get the weapons into the premises?
translation.es: ¿Él puede meter las armas en el lugar?

translation.en: What makes you think it’s a he?
translation.es: ¿Qué le hace pensar que es hombre?

translation.en: He, she.
Does the person have the daily access to get our weapons in before we show up?
translation.es: ¿La persona tiene acceso para entrar armas antes de que lleguemos?

translation.en: Something like that.
It’s a yes or no answer.
translation.es: Es un sí o un no.

translation.en: -If your answer is no? -This plan is useless.
translation.es: Si su respuesta es no, este plan es inútil.

translation.en: Yes.
Great.
What is going on?
[Mahmoud] Nze, I thought there will be emotions, you know, hugs, kisses, no?
translation.es: Nze, pensé que habría emociones. Abrazos, besos. ¿No?

translation.en: [Ahanna] I didn’t plan for any of these to happen.
[Ahanna] I got the money. I shared equally.
translation.es: Tengo el dinero. Lo dividí por igual.

translation.en: So that’s why... they found you,
in your dream home... on a farm,
translation.es: en la casa de tus sueños, en una granja,

translation.en: with your wife. Who just happened to be the curator of the gallery.
translation.es: con tu esposa. Que resultó ser la curadora de la galería.

translation.en: Ahanna, do you think the people that surround you are stupid?
translation.es: Ahanna, ¿crees que la gente que te rodea es estúpida?

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You're sorry? You're sorry?
You left me to rot in jail for five years.
translation.es: Me dejaste pudrirme en prisión por cinco años.

translation.en: And you say you're sorry?
[in Igbo] I was in chains for five years,
You took away my freedom.
But...
You put your snakes in my baby sister's belly.
translation.es: Pusiste tus serpientes en el vientre de mi hermana.

translation.en: You got Amarachi pregnant.
You got my baby sister pregnant.
[whispers] Ahanna...
Amara was pregnant?
[Mahmoud] Okay, okay, Nze, it's okay, it's okay.
We've got work to do. Ah? Settle your grievances later.
translation.es: Tenemos trabajo. Arreglen sus diferencias luego.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Anybody else have something to say?
[Egbe] When this is all over,
I will paint the streets with your blood.
translation.es: pintaré las calles con tu sangre.

translation.en: Wonderful, wonderful, at least you got it off your chest.
Snake.
As you have your plan, so I have mine.
translation.es: Tú tienes tu plan y yo tengo el mío.

translation.en: Four of you will do this job. And if you fuck me up,
translation.es: Cuatro de ustedes harán esto. Y si me joden…

translation.en: this man here
Spider, has instructions to kill your wife and your son.
translation.es: tiene instrucciones… de matar a tu esposa y a tu hijo.

translation.en: Boys, we got work to do.
Go and prepare.
Nze, when you get into the bank, you are in charge.
translation.es: Nze. Cuando entren al banco, tú estás a cargo.

translation.en: And if he does anything wrong, feel free to revisit your grievances.
translation.es: Y si él hace algo mal, pueden arreglar sus diferencias.

translation.en: Once you have the cash, call this number.
translation.es: Cuando tengan el dinero, llamen aquí.

translation.en: We'll be out in front ready to shoot anybody and any motherfucker that
translation.es: Estaremos al frente listos para disparar a cualquier hijo de puta

translation.en: tries to stop you people from getting away.
translation.es: que intente evitar que se escapen.

translation.en: Let's go.
Wait guys, we haven't even run through the plan yet.
translation.es: Esperen, aún no hemos repasado el plan.

translation.en: Snake, it kills you not to be in charge huh?
translation.es: Serpiente, detestas no estar a cargo, ¿no?

translation.en: This is not about being in charge.
translation.es: No se trata de estar a cargo.

translation.en: Common sense. We need to run through the plan.
translation.es: Es sentido común. Debemos repasar el plan.

translation.en: [Bala] Mahmoud told us your plan.
[in Pidgin] We go in looking like civil servants coming for their pension.
translation.es: Entramos como funcionarios que vienen por su pensión.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Our weapons are in the toilet.
translation.es: Las armas están en el baño.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Find the money and we collect it.
translation.es: Encontramos el dinero y lo tomamos.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] And kill anyone that tries to stop us.
translation.es: Y matamos a quien intente detenernos.

translation.en: Kill? No, no, no. Killing is not part of the plan.
translation.es: ¿Matar? No, matar no es parte del plan.

translation.en: Yeah.
That was my part of the plan.
translation.es: Esa era mi parte del plan.

translation.en: [Ahanna] They're gonna kill us.
Once we hand over the money, we're dead.
Don’t be stupid Nze. Trust me.
translation.es: - Maldito Serpiente. - No seas estúpido, Nze. Confía en mí.

translation.en: Don't you know Smoke anymore?
He killed my wife in front of my daughter. I think we all know what he is capable of.
translation.es: Mató a mi esposa frente a mi hija. Todos sabemos de lo que es capaz.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I didn’t know that.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho. No sabía eso.

translation.en: They also have my wife and kid. So sorry.
translation.es: También tienen a mi esposa e hijo. Lo siento.

translation.en: [whispers] I'm sorry.
Excuse me please, where's the toilet?
Thank you.
-[Nze] Everybody go down! -[screaming]
Down! Down all of you!
If you touch that... you'll meet your maker.
translation.es: Si tocas eso, morirás en el acto.

translation.en: Where is the manager? Manager?
Where is the Manager!
[in Pidgin] Where do you keep the money?
Up...upstairs.
[in Pidgin] Let's go.
[Nze] Downstairs where my eyes will be on you.
There's over 200 million upstairs.
And there's no way Bala can get it out, by himself.
translation.es: Y no hay forma de que Bala pueda sacarlos solo.

translation.en: Egbe is the best man for this place. So you either go or I go.
translation.es: Egbe es el mejor para esto. O vas tú o voy yo.

translation.en: Smoke's boys are at the entrance and exit. Any snake business, you are dead.
translation.es: Hay gente de Smoke en la entrada y salida. Si haces una de las tuyas, estás muerto.

translation.en: [Ahanna] Let's go.
[in Pidgin] Open the vault!
Bala, Bala.
[in Pidgin] What is it Ahanna?! What?
I'm so sorry, I didn’t know.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho. No lo sabía.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Did you care for my family while I was in prison?
translation.es: ¿Cuidaste a mi familia mientras estuve ahí?

translation.en: Of course I did. I sent money to them every single month.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Les envié dinero todos los meses.

translation.en: I swear to you bruv.
Open this thing!
[in Pidgin] Why should I trust you?
[in Pidgin] Five years, why should I trust you?
You can always trust me, you know.
translation.es: Sabes que puedes confiar en mí.

translation.en: I didn’t know you guys were going to be here today, There's something I need to tell you.
translation.es: No sabía que ibas a estar aquí. Hay algo que debo decirte.

translation.en: [man] You really are a mastermind.
You know me?
I grew up wanting to be like you.
[in Pidgin] will you like to work with me?
I said open this door!
[in Pidgin] Open it, stop wasting our time.
translation.es: Ábrela. Deja de perder el tiempo.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Sit down there.
What the fuck?
[Smoke] I don’t know boss. But something crazy is happening.
translation.es: No lo sé, jefe. Pero está ocurriendo algo de locos.

translation.en: It's like they know what's happening in the bank.
translation.es: Es como si supieran qué pasa.

translation.en: [Ike] It's them. They're back. Excuse me. It's them. The Armadas.
translation.es: Son ellos. Regresaron. Disculpa. Son ellos. Los Armada.

translation.en: [Ngozi] Why will they let the public in on an active robbery?
translation.es: ¿Por qué dejarían entrar gente durante un robo?

translation.en: [Ike] I'm going to figure that out.
-[in Pidgin] What is wrong with you? -Get out of the way!
Nze what are you doing? Stand down!
[in Igbo] What's happening outside?!
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces? ¡Abajo! - ¿Qué diablos pasa afuera? - ¿Qué pasa afuera? - ¿Cuál es tu problema?

translation.en: [in Igbo] What's wrong with you! Let's leave!
Oh my God!
[in Pidgin] Who wants to play Jesus Christ?
[Egbe] Let's go, let's go, let's go.
Egbe, there's no issue.
Once you get out, there's a crowd out there, spray them.
translation.es: Hay una multitud afuera. Tíralos al aire. Muy bien, vámonos.

translation.en: Let's go.
[Ahanna] The crowd was bigger than I ever imagined.
translation.es: La multitud era más grande de lo que pensé.

translation.en: It was like a protest. The kind that swells and spills.
translation.es: Parecía una protesta. De las que se agrandan, esparcen

translation.en: Overflowing the street with chaos. This was my escape plan.
translation.es: y desbordan las calles con caos. Era mi plan de escape.

translation.en: I just needed to get a message to the right person.
translation.es: Debía enviar un mensaje a alguien.

translation.en: Snake!
And once the opportunity presented itself, I took it.
translation.es: Y cuando se presentó la oportunidad… ¡Serpiente! la aproveché.

translation.en: Sparrow to Control, Control how do you read?
-[man] Loud and clear sparrow. -[Nze] Snake!
[in Pidgin] Get out of the way! Snake!
[man] Overhead the scene of the bank robbery at broad street
translation.es: Estamos sobre el robo al banco en Broad Street.

translation.en: A rapid response squad and a team of policemen
translation.es: Un equipo de respuesta rápida y la policía

translation.en: have condoned up the entire area.
[in Igbo] Can you kill a dead man?
[Ahanna] I thought watching my mother die was the worst thing
translation.es: Pensaba que ver morir a mi madre

translation.en: that could ever happen to me.
translation.es: era lo peor que me podía pasar…

translation.en: Until I watched my brother die.
translation.es: hasta que vi morir a mi hermano.

translation.en: Please.
Put the gun down.
[Ahanna in Igbo] Please.
I didn’t know you were pregnant.
I only just found out this morning. Nze told me this morning. I swear to God.
translation.es: Me enteré esta mañana. Nze me lo dijo hoy. Lo juro por Dios.

translation.en: Put the gun down.
Ahanna!
[in Igbo] Adaugo, stay in the car, please. Stay in the car!
translation.es: Adaugo, quédate en el auto, por favor. ¡Quédate ahí!

translation.en: [in Igbo] Please. Please, please. Please don’t shoot. Please don’t kill him.
translation.es: Por favor, no dispares. Por favor, no lo mates.

translation.en: I loved him too. Amara, Nze was my brother, you know.
translation.es: Yo también lo amaba. Amara, Nze era mi hermano y lo sabes.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[boy] Mum, come on.
Guess what? I won the game.
Just stop... Keep playing.
Okay? Keep playing, we'll be with you shortly. We love you!
translation.es: Sigue jugando. Pronto estaremos contigo. Te amamos.

translation.en: You have a child?
Which do you prefer?
Freedom
or love?
Love.
Wrong answer.
[Adaugo] I...I love you.
God why!!!
There are key moments in one's life.
translation.es: Hay momentos claves en la vida

translation.en: That shape the core of who you are.
Who you become.
This... would be my son's first.
translation.es: Este sería el primero de mi hijo.

translation.en: His first memory.
Subtitled by: Anu Akiyode
